summary.span: 提供对“消息队列”服务器上的队列的访问。

span.span: Provides access to a queue on a Message Queuing server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列技术就允许在不同时间运行的应用程序能够跨异构网络和可能是暂时处于脱机状态的系统进行通信。The Message Queuing technology allows applications running at different times to communicate across heterogeneous networks and systems that might be temporarily offline. 应用程序发送、 接收或查看从队列中的 （而不删除读取） 消息。Applications send, receive, or peek (read without removing) messages from queues. 消息队列是一个可选组件的[!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]和 Windows NT 中，并且必须单独安装。Message Queuing is an optional component of [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)] and Windows NT, and must be installed separately. 类是消息队列周围的包装器。The class is a wrapper around Message Queuing. 有多个版本的消息队列，以及使用类可能会导致略有不同的行为，具体取决于操作系统使用。There are multiple versions of Message Queuing, and using the class can result in slightly different behavior, depending on the operating system you are using. 有关特定功能的每个版本的消息队列的信息，请参阅 MSDN 中的平台 SDK 中的"什么是消息队列中的新增功能"主题。For information about specific features of each version of Message Queuing, see the topic "What's New in Message Queuing" in the Platform SDK in MSDN. 类提供对消息队列的队列的引用。The class provides a reference to a Message Queuing queue. 你可以指定在路径构造函数，以连接到现有资源，或者让你可以在服务器上创建一个新队列。You can specify a path in the constructor to connect to an existing resource, or you can create a new queue on the server. 在可以调用之前， ，或，必须将关联的新实例与某个现有队列的类。Before you can call , , or , you must associate the new instance of the class with an existing queue. 此时，如操作队列属性和。At that point, you can manipulate the queue properties such as and . 支持两种类型的消息检索： 同步和异步。 supports two types of message retrieval: synchronous and asynchronous. 同步方法，和，会导致进程线程等待新消息到达队列中指定的时间间隔。The synchronous methods, and , cause the process thread to wait a specified time interval for a new message to arrive in the queue. 异步方法，和，允许以继续在一个单独的线程，直到消息到达队列中的主应用程序任务。The asynchronous methods, and , allow the main application tasks to continue in a separate thread until a message arrives in the queue. 这些方法通过使用回调对象和状态对象将在线程之间的信息进行工作。These methods work by using callback objects and state objects to communicate information between threads. 当你创建的新实例类，不在创建一个新的消息队列队列。When you create a new instance of the class, you are not creating a new Message Queuing queue. 相反，你可以使用， ，和方法来管理服务器上的队列。Instead, you can use the , , and methods to manage queues on the server. 与不同，和是`static`成员，因此您可以调用它们而无需创建的新实例类。Unlike , and are `static` members, so you can call them without creating a new instance of the class. 你可以设置对象的具有三个名称之一属性： 的友好名称， ，或。You can set the object's property with one of three names: the friendly name, the , or the . 友好名称，由队列的定义和属性，是 \\ 公共队列和 \\ `Private$` \\ 专用队列的。The friendly name, which is defined by the queue's and properties, is \\ for a public queue, and \\`Private$`\\ for a private queue. 属性允许脱机访问消息队列。The property allows offline access to message queues. 最后，你可以使用队列的属性来设置队列的。Lastly, you can use the queue's property to set the queue's . 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建新对象使用各种路径名称语法类型。The following code example creates new objects using various path name syntax types. 在每个情况下，它将消息发送到其路径定义构造函数中的队列。In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CPP/mqpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CS/mqpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/VB/mqpath.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例向队列发送消息和接收来自队列，使用名为的应用程序特定类的消息`Order`。The following code example sends a message to a queue, and receives a message from a queue, using an application-specific class called `Order`. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CPP/mqreceive_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CS/mqreceive_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/VB/mqreceive_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载来创建的新实例不立即绑定到消息队列服务器上的队列的类。Use this overload to create a new instance of the class that is not immediately tied to a queue on the Message Queuing server. 使用此实例前，你必须将其连接到现有消息队列队列通过设置属性。Before using this instance, you must connect it to an existing Message Queuing queue by setting the property. 或者，您可以设置引用方法的返回值，从而创建一个新的消息队列队列。Alternatively, you can set the reference to the method's return value, thereby creating a new Message Queuing queue. 构造函数实例化的新实例类; 它不会创建一个新的消息队列队列。The constructor instantiates a new instance of the class; it does not create a new Message Queuing queue. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class. 所有的筛选器值设置为`true`。All the filter values are set to `true`.| ||`false`| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新。The following code example creates a new . remarks.format:
## Remarks 当你想要将新使用此重载到特定消息队列的队列，并为其知道路径、 格式名或标签的实例。Use this overload when you want to tie the new instance to a particular Message Queuing queue, for which you know the path, format name, or label. 如果你想要授予对第一个应用程序独占访问权引用队列，则必须设置属性`true`或使用传递的读取访问权限限制参数的构造函数。If you want to grant exclusive access to the first application that references the queue, you must set the property to `true` or use the constructor that passes a read-access restriction parameter. 构造函数实例化的新实例类; 它不会创建一个新的消息队列队列。The constructor instantiates a new instance of the class; it does not create a new Message Queuing queue. 若要在消息队列中创建新队列，使用。To create a new queue in Message Queuing, use . 语法`path`参数取决于队列的类型它的引用下, 表中所示。The syntax of the `path` parameter depends on the type of queue it references, as shown in the following table. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日记队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日记队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 或者，可以使用或来描述队列路径中下, 表中所示。Alternatively, you can use the or to describe the queue path, as shown in the following table. |参考Reference|语法Syntax|示例Example| |---------------|------------|-------------| |格式名称Format name|`FormatName:` [*格式名*]`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]|`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112

`FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |LabelLabel|`Label:` [*标签*]`Label:` [ *label* ]|`Label:` 标签`Label:` TheLabel| 若要在脱机工作，必须使用的格式名称语法，而不是路径名称语法构造函数。To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, not the path name syntax for the constructor. 否则，因为该域的主域控制器不可用来为格式名称解析路径，则会引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller is not available to resolve the path to the format name. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . 这些值基于消息队列队列的属性与指定的路径`path`参数。These values are based on the properties of the Message Queuing queue with the path specified by the `path` parameter. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||00| ||| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||`true`如果消息队列队列的隐私级别设置为"正文";否则为`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing queue's privacy level setting is "Body"; otherwise, `false`.| ||| ||| ||消息队列队列的计算机名称属性的值。The value of the Message Queuing queue's computer name property.| ||| ||| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||如果未设置由构造函数。, if not set by the constructor.| ||如果未设置由构造函数。, if not set by the constructor.| ||`false`| ||`true`如果启用了消息队列对象的日志设置;否则为`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing object's journal setting is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建新对象使用各种路径名称语法类型。The following code example creates new objects using various path name syntax types. 在每个情况下，它将消息发送到其路径定义构造函数中的队列。In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CPP/mqpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CS/mqpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/VB/mqpath.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当你想要将新使用此重载到特定消息队列的队列，并为其知道路径、 格式名或标签。Use this overload when you want to tie the new to a particular Message Queuing queue, for which you know the path, format name, or label. 如果你想要授予对第一个应用程序独占访问权引用队列，请将设置`sharedModeDenyReceive`参数`true`。If you want to grant exclusive access to the first application that references the queue, set the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter to `true`. 否则，设置`sharedModeDenyReceive`到`false`或使用构造函数仅具有`path`参数。Otherwise, set `sharedModeDenyReceive` to `false` or use the constructor that has only a `path` parameter. 设置`sharedModeDenyReceive`到`true`影响访问消息队列队列，包括其他应用程序的所有对象。Setting `sharedModeDenyReceive` to `true` affects all objects that access the Message Queuing queue, including other applications. 参数的效果并不限于此应用程序。The effects of the parameter are not restricted to this application. 构造函数创建的新实例类; 它不会创建一个新的消息队列队列。The constructor creates a new instance of the class; it does not create a new Message Queuing queue. 若要在消息队列中创建新队列，使用。To create a new queue in Message Queuing, use . 语法`path`参数依赖于的队列的类型。The syntax of the `path` parameter depends on the type of queue. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日记队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日记队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 或者，你可以使用的格式名或标签的消息队列的队列来描述队列路径。Alternatively, you can use the format name or label of a Message Queuing queue to describe the queue path. |参考Reference|语法Syntax|示例Example| |---------------|------------|-------------| |格式名称Format name|`FormatName:` [*格式名*]`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]|`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112

`FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |LabelLabel|`Label:` [*标签*]`Label:` [ *label* ]|`Label:` 标签`Label:` TheLabel| 若要在脱机工作，必须使用格式名语法，而不是友好名称语法。To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, rather than the friendly name syntax. 否则，因为该域的主域控制器 （在其 Active Directory 处于） 不是可用于为格式名称解析的路径，则会引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller (on which Active Directory resides) is not available to resolve the path to the format name. 如果打开一个队列`sharedModeDenyReceive`参数设置为`true`、 任何，随后尝试从队列中读取生成由于共享冲突。If a opens a queue with the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter set to `true`, any that subsequently tries to read from the queue generates a because of a sharing violation. A也会引发如果尝试访问以独占模式，而此时另一个队列已有非独占访问该队列。A is also thrown if a tries to access the queue in exclusive mode while another already has non-exclusive access to the queue. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . 这些值基于属性的消息队列队列中，使用指定的路径`path`参数。These values are based on the properties of the Message Queuing queue, with the path specified by the `path` parameter. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`。`false`.| ||0.0.| ||。.| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||`true`如果消息队列队列的隐私级别设置为"正文";否则为`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing queue's privacy level setting is "Body"; otherwise, `false`.| ||。.| ||。.| ||消息队列队列的计算机名称属性的值。The value of the Message Queuing queue's computer name property.| ||。.| ||。.| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||如果未设置由构造函数。, if not set by the constructor.| ||如果未设置由构造函数。, if not set by the constructor.| ||`sharedModeDenyReceive` 参数的值。The value of the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter.| ||`true`如果启用了消息队列对象的日志设置;否则为`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing object's journal setting is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新具有独占访问权，将设置其路径中，并向队列发送消息。The following code example creates a new with exclusive access, sets its path, and sends a message to the queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive/CPP/mqctor_denysharedreceive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive/CS/mqctor_denysharedreceive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive/VB/mqctor_denysharedreceive.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 队列的默认访问模式是`QueueAccessMode.SendAndReceive`，除非另行指定，否则时调用的构造函数。The default access mode for a queue is `QueueAccessMode.SendAndReceive`, unless you specify otherwise when calling the constructor.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示队列是否仅接受经过身份验证的消息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息身份验证提供的方法来确保消息完整性和验证的发件人消息。Message authentication provides a way to ensure message integrity and to verify who sent the message. 若要请求身份验证，发送应用程序，请设置消息的身份验证级别。To request authentication, the sending application sets the message's authentication level. 当你将设置到`true`，可将在服务器上，而不仅与此队列的访问权限实例。When you set to `true`, you are restricting access to the queue on the server, not only to this instance. 将影响所有客户端使用相同的消息队列队列。All clients working against the same Message Queuing queue will be affected. 只接受经过身份验证的消息队列将拒绝未经身份验证的消息。A queue that accepts only authenticated messages will reject a non-authenticated message. 若要请求消息遭到拒绝的通知，发送应用程序可以设置消息的属性。To request notification of message rejection, a sending application can set the property of the message. 因为消息遭到拒绝的任何其他指示不存在，则发送应用程序可以丢失的消息，除非您请求，它将发送到死信队列。Because no other indication of message rejection exists, the sending application can lose the message unless you request that it be sent to the dead-letter queue. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. summary.span: 获取或设置基优先级，“消息队列”使用该基优先级在网络上传送公共队列的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the base priority Message Queuing uses to route a public queue's messages over the network.

value.span: 发送到（公共）队列的所有消息的单个基本优先级。

span.span: The single base priority for all messages sent to the (public) queue.

value.span: 默认值为零 (0)。

span.span: The default is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列的基本优先级指定如何一条消息路由到的队列被视为通过网络传输。A message queue's base priority specifies how a message en route to that queue is treated as it travels through the network. 你可以设置属性来授予较高或较低的优先级，于发送到指定的队列比发送到其他队列的所有消息。You can set the property to confer a higher or lower priority to all messages sent to the specified queue than those sent to other queues. 将此属性设置修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他的更改会影响实例。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 消息队列的无关消息，它指定在其中传入消息放置在队列中的顺序的属性。A message queue's is not related to the property of a message, which specifies the order in which an incoming message is placed in the queue. 将应用使用的格式名来指定其路径仅为公共队列。 applies only to public queues whose paths are specified using the format name. 专用队列的基本优先级始终为零 (0)。The base priority of a private queue is always zero (0). 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理，你使用引发事件时的消息变得在队列中可用。In asynchronous processing, you use to raise the event when a message becomes available in the queue. 也会引发一条消息在队列中已存在。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 若要使用、 创建的事件处理程序处理的异步操作的结果，并将其与你的事件委托。To use , create an event handler that processes the results of the asynchronous operation, and associate it with your event delegate. 启动异步扫视操作;则通知，通过引发事件，当消息到达队列中。 initiates an asynchronous peek operation; the is notified, through the raising of the event, when a message arrives in the queue. 然后可以通过调用访问消息或通过检索结果使用。The can then access the message by calling or by retrieving the result using the . 方法立即返回，但直到调用事件处理程序，则不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 因为是异步的你可以调用它可查看队列，而不必阻止当前线程的执行。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to peek the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要以同步方式查看队列，请使用方法。To synchronously peek the queue, use the method. 异步操作完成后，你可以调用或再次中继续接收通知的事件处理程序。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. ，返回标识方法启动异步操作。The that returns identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 你可以使用此的整个生存期内此操作，尽管你通常不使用它之前调用。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果启动多个异步操作，你可以将其值在数组中，并指定是否等待所有的操作或任何操作完成。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，使用属性用于标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 如果是`false`，引发完成事件时，但调用时，将引发异常。If is `false`, the completion event is raised, but an exception will be thrown when calling . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建名为一个事件处理程序`MyPeekCompleted`，将其附加到事件处理程序委托，然后调用启动位于路径的队列上的异步查看操作"。 \myQueue"。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 当引发事件，该示例扫视消息，并将其正文写入到屏幕。When a event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen. 该示例然后调用以启动新的异步扫视操作。The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation. If the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter expires, this component raises the event. 因为不存在的任何消息的后续调用将引发异常。Because no message exists, a subsequent call to will throw an exception. 如果是`false`，引发完成事件时，但调用时，将引发异常。If is `false`, the completion event is raised, but an exception will be thrown when calling . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个异步查看操作，使用队列路径"。 \myQueue"。The following code example creates an asynchronous peek operation, using the queue path ".\myQueue". 它将创建事件处理程序， `MyPeekCompleted`，并将其附加到事件处理程序委托。It creates an event handler, `MyPeekCompleted`, and attaches it to the event handler delegate. 调用的超时值为 1 分钟后，可启动异步扫视操作。 is called with a time-out of one minute, to initiate the asynchronous peek operation. 当引发事件或超时时间已到，如果存在，并且其正文会写入到屏幕检索消息。When a event is raised or the time-out expires, the message is retrieved if one exists, and its body is written to the screen. 然后会再次调用以启动新的异步扫视操作相同的超时时间。Then is called again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation with the same time-out. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用此重载时，回调参数中指定时将调用回调直接的消息变得可用队列中或已过期的指定的时间间隔;不会引发事件。When you use this overload, the callback specified in the callback parameter is invoked directly when a message becomes available in the queue or when the specified interval of time has expired; the event is not raised. 其他重载的依赖于此组件以引发事件。The other overloads of rely on this component to raise the event. 也会引发一条消息在队列中已存在。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 方法立即返回，但直到调用事件处理程序，则不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 因为是异步的你可以调用它可查看队列，而不必阻止当前线程的执行。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to peek the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要以同步方式查看队列，请使用方法。To synchronously peek the queue, use the method. 异步操作完成后，你可以调用或再次中继续接收通知的事件处理程序。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. 返回标识方法启动异步操作。 returns a that identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 你可以使用此的整个生存期内此操作，尽管你通常不使用它之前调用。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果启动多个异步操作，你可以将其值在数组中，并指定是否等待所有的操作或任何操作完成。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，使用属性用于标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 状态对象将与操作相关联的状态信息。The state object associates state information with the operation. 例如，如果你调用多次启动多个操作，你可以指定每个操作通过你定义单独的状态对象。For example, if you call multiple times to initiate multiple operations, you can identify each operation through a separate state object that you define. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个异步查看操作。The following code example creates an asynchronous peek operation. 此代码示例将发送一条消息到本地的消息队列，然后调用，并传入： 超时值为十秒; 标识该特定的消息; 和的新实例的唯一整数标识的事件处理程序中， `MyPeekCompleted`.The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls , passing in: a time-out value of ten seconds; a unique integer that identifies that particular message; and a new instance of that identifies the event handler, `MyPeekCompleted`. 当引发事件，事件处理程序扫视消息，并将消息正文和整数消息标识符写到屏幕。When a event is raised, the event handler peeks at the message and writes the message body and the integer message identifier to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理，你使用引发事件时从队列中删除一条消息。In asynchronous processing, you use to raise the event when a message has been removed from the queue. 也会引发一条消息在队列中已存在。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 若要使用、 创建的事件处理程序处理异步操作的结果，并将其与你的事件委托。To use , create an event handler that processes the results of the asynchronous operation and associate it with your event delegate. 启动异步接收操作;则通知，通过引发事件，当消息到达队列中。 initiates an asynchronous receive operation; the is notified, through the raising of the event, when a message arrives in the queue. 然后可以通过调用访问消息。The can then access the message by calling . 方法立即返回，但直到调用事件处理程序，则不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 因为是异步的你可以调用它可接收来自队列的消息，而不会阻止当前线程的执行。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to receive a message from the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要以同步方式收到一条消息，使用方法。To synchronously receive a message, use the method. 异步操作完成后，你可以调用或再次中继续接收通知的事件处理程序。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. ，返回标识方法启动异步操作。The that returns identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 你可以使用此的整个生存期内此操作，尽管你通常不使用它之前调用。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果启动多个异步操作，你可以将其值在数组中，并指定是否等待所有的操作或任何操作完成。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，使用属性用于标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 如果是`false`，引发完成事件时，但调用时，将引发异常。If is `false`, the completion event is raised, but an exception will be thrown when calling . 不使用异步调用与事务。Do not use the asynchronous call with transactions. 如果你想要执行的事务的异步操作，调用，并将事务和 （同步）扫视操作在你创建的事件处理程序方法。If you want to perform a transactional asynchronous operation, call , and put the transaction and the (synchronous) method within the event handler you create for the peek operation. 事件处理程序可能包含功能，如下面的 C# 代码中所示。Your event handler might contain functionality as shown in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.BeginTransaction(); myMessageQueue.Receive(); myMessageQueue.CommitTransaction(); ``` 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例链接异步请求。The following code example chains asynchronous requests. 它假定名为"myQueue"的本地计算机上没有队列。It assumes there is a queue on the local computer called "myQueue". `Main`函数开始异步操作由处理`MyReceiveCompleted`例程。The `Main` function begins the asynchronous operation that is handled by the `MyReceiveCompleted` routine. `MyReceiveCompleted` 处理当前消息并开始一个新异步接收操作。`MyReceiveCompleted` processes the current message and begins a new asynchronous receive operation. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CPP/mqbeginreceive_noparms_mre.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CS/mqbeginreceive_noparms_mre.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/VB/mqbeginreceive_noparms_mre.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例将异步请求排队。The following code example queues asynchronous requests. 调用使用其返回值中。The call to uses the in its return value. `Main`例程等待所有异步操作，可在退出之前完成。The `Main` routine waits for all asynchronous operations to be completed before exiting. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CPP/mqbeginreceive_noparms_wh.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CS/mqbeginreceive_noparms_wh.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/VB/mqbeginreceive_noparms_wh.vb#2)]

If the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter expires, this component raises the event. 因为不存在的任何消息的后续调用将引发异常。Because no message exists, a subsequent call to will throw an exception. 不使用异步调用与事务。Do not use the asynchronous call with transactions. 如果你想要执行的事务的异步操作，调用，并将事务和 （同步）扫视操作在你创建的事件处理程序方法。If you want to perform a transactional asynchronous operation, call , and put the transaction and the (synchronous) method within the event handler you create for the peek operation. 事件处理程序可能包含功能，如下面的 C# 代码中所示。Your event handler might contain functionality as shown in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.BeginTransaction(); myMessageQueue.Receive(); myMessageQueue.CommitTransaction(); ``` 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建异步接收操作。The following code example creates an asynchronous receive operation. 此代码示例创建一个事件处理程序即`MyReceiveCompleted`，并将其附加到事件处理程序委托。The code example creates an event handler, `MyReceiveCompleted`, and attaches it to the event handler delegate. 此代码示例将发送一条消息到本地的消息队列，然后调用，并传入超时值为十秒。The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls , passing in a time-out value of ten seconds. 当引发事件，事件处理程序接收消息，并将消息正文写到屏幕。When a event is raised, the event handler receives the message and writes the message body to the screen. initiates an asynchronous receive operation; the is notified, through the raising of the event, when a message arrives in the queue. 然后可以通过调用访问消息或检索结果使用。The can then access the message by calling or retrieving the result using the . 方法立即返回，但直到调用事件处理程序，则不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 因为是异步的你可以调用它可接收来自队列的消息，而不会阻止当前线程的执行。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to receive a message from the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要以同步方式收到一条消息，使用方法。To synchronously receive a message, use the method. 异步操作完成后，你可以调用或再次中继续接收通知的事件处理程序。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. ，返回标识方法启动异步操作。The that returns identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 你可以使用此的整个生存期内此操作，尽管你通常不使用它之前调用。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果启动多个异步操作，你可以将其值在数组中，并指定是否等待所有的操作或任何操作完成。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，使用属性用于标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 此重载指定超时和状态对象。This overload specifies a time-out and a state object. 如果指定的间隔`timeout`参数过期，则此组件引发事件。If the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter expires, this component raises the event. 因为不存在的任何消息的后续调用将引发异常。Because no message exists, a subsequent call to will throw an exception. 状态对象将与操作相关联的状态信息。The state object associates state information with the operation. 例如，如果你调用多次启动多个操作，你可以指定每个操作通过你定义单独的状态对象。For example, if you call multiple times to initiate multiple operations, you can identify each operation through a separate state object that you define. 状态对象还可用于跨进程线程中传递信息。You can also use the state object to pass information across process threads. 如果在线程启动，但在另一个线程中的异步方案是回调，状态对象封送，并从该事件传递回以及信息。If a thread is started but the callback is on a different thread in an asynchronous scenario, the state object is marshaled and passed back along with information from the event. 不使用异步调用与事务。Do not use the asynchronous call with transactions. 如果你想要执行的事务的异步操作，调用，并将事务和 （同步）扫视操作在你创建的事件处理程序方法。If you want to perform a transactional asynchronous operation, call , and put the transaction and the (synchronous) method within the event handler you create for the peek operation. 事件处理程序可能包含功能，如下面的 C# 代码中所示。Your event handler might contain functionality as shown in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.BeginTransaction(); myMessageQueue.Receive(); myMessageQueue.CommitTransaction(); ``` 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建异步接收操作。The following code example creates an asynchronous receive operation. 此代码示例创建一个事件处理程序即`MyReceiveCompleted`，并将其附加到事件处理程序委托。The code example creates an event handler, `MyReceiveCompleted`, and attaches it to the event handler delegate. 此代码示例将发送一条消息到本地的消息队列，然后调用，并传入超时值为十秒和一个唯一的整数，它标识该特定消息。The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls , passing in a time-out value of ten seconds and a unique integer that identifies that particular message. 当引发事件，事件处理程序接收消息，并将消息正文和整数消息标识符写入屏幕。When a event is raised, the event handler receives the message and writes the message body and the integer message identifier to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示应用程序是否能够查看或从队列接收消息。 indicates whether the application is able to peek or receive messages from the queue. 如果是`true`、可以接收或查看从队列的消息。If is `true`, the can receive or peek messages from the queue. 否则，不能。Otherwise, it cannot. 是`false`如果队列已打开使用独占读取访问权 (或如果它是使用非独占访问权限和这打开请求独占访问权)，或如果应用程序没有足够的权限访问它。 is `false` if a queue is already open with exclusive read access (or if it's open with non-exclusive access and this requests exclusive access), or if the application does not have sufficient rights to access it. 如果你的应用程序尝试从队列中读取时是`false`，访问被拒绝。If your application tries to read from a queue when is `false`, access is denied. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的消息队列的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 队列类别允许应用程序对它的队列进行分类。The queue category allows an application to categorize its queues. 例如，你可以将所有计费队列都放在一个类别和在另一个中的所有订单队列中。For example, you can place all Billing queues in one category and all Order queues in another. 属性提供访问权限 （这是读/写） 的消息队列类型 ID 属性，可通过访问**队列属性**计算机管理控制台中的对话框。The property provides access to the Message Queuing Type ID property (which is read/write), accessible through the **Queue Properties** dialog box in the Computer Management Console. 你可以定义新类别。You can define a new category. 尽管可以使用来创建跨所有都是唯一的类别值值，执行此操作是不必要的。Although you can use to create a category value that is unique across all values, such an action is unnecessary. 类别值必须是不同于其他类别，不是从所有其他仅值。The category value needs to be distinct only from other categories, not from all other values. 例如，你可以分配{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}作为为一组队列和{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}作为为另一组。For example, you can assign {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001} as the for one set of queues and {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002} as the for another set. 不需要设置。It is not necessary to set the . 该值可以为 `null`。The value can be `null`. 将此属性设置修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他的更改会影响实例。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#7)]

summary.span: 释放 分配的所有资源。

span.span: Frees all resources allocated by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 释放与关联的所有资源，包括根据共享资源。 frees all resources associated with a , including shared resources if appropriate. 系统自动重新获取这些资源它们是否仍然可用，例如当调用方法，如下面的 C# 代码所示。The system re-acquires these resources automatically if they are still available, for example when you call the method, as in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.Send("Text 1."); myMessageQueue.Close(); myMessageQueue.Send("Text 2."); //Resources are re-acquired. ``` 当调用，所有直接访问消息队列队列的属性会清除。， ， ，和所有保持不变。When you call , all properties that directly access the Message Queuing queue are cleared out. The , , , and all remain as they were. 不会不能始终释放读取和写入队列的句柄，因为它们可能被共享。 does not always free the read and write handles to a queue, because they might be shared. 你可以采取以下步骤以确保任一释放到队列的读取和写入句柄：You can take any of the following steps to ensure that frees the read and write handles to a queue: - 创建具有独占访问权。Create the with exclusive access. 为此，请调用或构造函数，并且组`sharedModeDenyReceive`参数`true`。To do so, call the or constructor, and set the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter to `true`. - 创建禁用了连接缓存。Create the with connection caching disabled. 为此，请调用构造函数和组`enableConnectionCache`参数`false`。To do so, call the constructor and set the `enableConnectionCache` parameter to `false`. - 禁用连接缓存。Disable connection caching. 为此，请设置属性`false`。To do so, set the property to `false`. 应调用队列之前删除消息队列服务器上的队列。You should call for a queue before you delete the queue on the Message Queuing server. 否则为，请发送到队列的消息无法引发异常，或出现在死信队列中。Otherwise, messages sent to the queue could throw exceptions or appear in the dead-letter queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将关闭消息队列的队列。The following code example closes a Message Queuing queue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要将发送的类型不是任何对象到队列，将对象插入到消息队列消息。When you send any object that is not of type to the queue, the inserts the object into a Message Queuing message. 在那时，适用于消息中指定的属性值属性。At that time, the applies to the message the property values you specify in the property. 相反，如果你发送到队列，这些属性已指定为该实例本身，因此对于，将忽略。Conversely, if you send a to the queue, these properties are already specified for the instance itself, so is ignored for the . 尽管您设置的属性通过对象，引用的是发送到队列，队列本身的消息属性。Although you set the properties through the object, the refers to the properties of the messages that are sent to the queue, not the queue itself. 下表中显示属性的默认值。The default values for the properties are shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`AcknowledgeType.None`| ||`null`| ||零 (0)Zero (0)| ||`true`| ||`EncryptionAlgorithm.RC2`| ||一个零长度的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`HashAlgorithm.MD5`| ||空字符串 ("")Empty string ("")| ||`MessagePriority.Normal`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用一条消息的优先级来确定要发送的消息的默认属性。The following code example uses the priority of a message to determine default properties to send for the message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定引用此队列的共享的模式。 specifies the shared mode of the queue referenced by this . 设置到`true`以指示只有这应具有访问权限以查看或从指定的队列接收消息。Set to `true` to indicate that only this should have access to peek or receive messages from the queue with the specified . 如果另一个或者通过同一队列资源，该实例关联的另一个应用程序或应用程序将不能查看或接收消息，但它仍可发送它们。If another or another application is associated with the same queue resource, that instance or application will not be able to peek or receive messages, but it can still send them. 如果是`false`，队列可供多个应用程序来发送、 扫视、 或接收消息。If is `false`, the queue is available to multiple applications for sending, peeking, or receiving messages. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便可以通过垃圾回收回收其占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. 应调用在发布到最后一个引用之前。You should call before you release your last reference to the . 否则为资源是使用不会被释放之前垃圾集合调用对象的析构函数。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用程序是否维护连接缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a cache of connections will be maintained by the application.

span.span: to create and use a connection cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接缓存是对结构包含读取或写入队列的句柄的引用列表。A connection cache is a list of references to structures that contain read or write handles to queues. 当是`true`、借用从缓存的句柄您每次调用， ，或，而不是打开新的句柄。When is `true`, the borrows handles from the cache each time you call , , or , rather than open new handles. 这可以提高性能。This can improve performance. 使用连接缓存还使网络拓扑中的更改。Using a connection cache also insulates the from changes in the network topology. 如果你创建新的连接到队列，当连接缓存已满，覆盖最近访问最少的结构与新的连接。If you create a new connection to a queue when the connection cache is full, the overwrites the least recently accessed structure with the new connection. 你可以完全由调用清除缓存，例如，如果你正在使用的队列的格式名已更改，以便以前的读取和写入句柄不再有效。You can clear the cache entirely by calling , for example, if the format names of the queues you are working with have changed so that the previous read and write handles are no longer valid. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定该加密是必需的消息发送到队列时，只有消息正文进行加密。When you specify that encryption is required for the messages sent to a queue, only the message bodies are encrypted. 其他成员 (例如，和属性) 不能被加密。The other members (for example, the and properties) cannot be encrypted. 将此属性设置修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他的更改会影响实例。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 加密的邮件将使私有消息。Encrypting a message makes the message private. 你可以指定队列的加密需要`None`， `Body`，或`Optional`通过设置属性正确。You can specify the queue's encryption requirement to be `None`, `Body`, or `Optional` by setting the property appropriately. 消息的设置必须与对应的队列的加密要求。The setting of the message must correspond to the encryption requirement of the queue. 如果未加密消息，而队列指定`Body`，或者如果消息已加密，而队列指定`None`，消息被拒绝由队列。If the message is not encrypted but the queue specifies `Body`, or if the message is encrypted but the queue specifies `None`, the message is rejected by the queue. 如果发送应用程序请求在这种情况的否定确认消息，消息队列指示发送应用程序的消息遭到拒绝。If the sending application requests a negative acknowledgment message in this event, Message Queuing indicates the message's rejection to the sending application. 如果属性是`true`，加密失败消息发送到死信队列。If the property is `true`, a message that fails encryption is sent to the dead-letter queue. 否则，消息将丢失。Otherwise, the message is lost. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当引发事件时，完成由启动的操作调用。When the event is raised, completes the operation that was initiated by the call. 为此，请查看的消息。To do so, peeks the message. 可以指定超时，这会导致如果队列中出现一条消息之前发生超时的时候引发的事件。 can specify a time-out, which causes the event to be raised if the time-out occurs before a message appears in the queue. 当发生超时则没有消息到达队列的后续调用中引发异常。When a time-out occurs without a message arriving in the queue, a subsequent call to throws an exception. 用于读取导致的消息引发事件。 is used to read the message that caused the event to be raised. 如果你想要继续以异步方式扫视消息，则可以再次调用之后调用。If you want to continue to asynchronously peek messages, you can again call after calling . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建名为一个事件处理程序`MyPeekCompleted`，将其附加到事件处理程序委托，然后调用启动位于路径的队列上的异步查看操作"。 \myQueue"。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 当引发事件，该示例扫视消息，并将其正文写入到屏幕。When a event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen. 该示例然后调用以启动新的异步扫视操作。The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CPP/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CS/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/VB/mqbeginpeek_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定消息队列的队列是否存在在指定路径。The method determines whether a Message Queuing queue exists at a specified path. 不存在的方法来确定是否存在具有指定的格式名称的队列。No method exists to determine whether a queue with a specified format name exists. 有关格式名语法和其他路径语法窗体的详细信息，请参阅属性。)For more information about the format name syntax and other path syntax forms, see the property.) 是代价高昂的操作。 is an expensive operation. 应用程序中的必要时，请使用它。Use it only when it is necessary within the application. > [!NOTE] > 方法不支持前缀。The method does not support the prefix. 语法`path`参数取决于队列的类型下表中所示。The syntax for the `path` parameter depends on the type of queue, as shown in the following table. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| 无法调用它以验证远程专用队列存在。 cannot be called to verify the existence of a remote private queue. 有关更多的语法，请参阅属性。For more syntax, see the property. 或者，可以使用来描述队列路径。Alternatively, you can use the to describe the queue path. |参考Reference|语法Syntax| |---------------|------------| |LabelLabel|标签: [ `label` ]Label:[ `label` ]| 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|否No| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例验证消息队列的队列是否存在，，然后将其删除。The following code example verifies whether a Message Queuing queue exists, and then deletes it. summary.span: 获取“消息队列”在创建队列时生成的唯一队列名。

span.span: Gets the unique queue name that Message Queuing generated at the time of the queue's creation.

value.span: 队列的名称，该名称在网络上是唯一的。

span.span: The name for the queue, which is unique on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含队列的格式名。The property contains the format name of the queue. 消息队列使用的格式名来标识要打开的队列以及如何访问它。Message Queuing uses the format name to identify which queue to open and how to access it. 与大部分队列的特征，不同的格式名不是消息队列应用程序队列属性，因此不能通过消息队列管理工具访问它。Unlike most of a queue's characteristics, the format name is not a Message Queuing application queue property, so you cannot access it through the Message Queuing management tool. 格式名只是的唯一名称的队列，当它创建队列或更高版本生成应用程序的消息队列生成的。The format name is simply a unique name for the queue, which Message Queuing generates when it creates the queue or which the application generates later. 如果指定路径中使用的路径名称语法 (如`myComputer\myQueue`) 而不是在读取或写入到队列时，请使用格式名称语法，主域控制器 （它使用 Active Directory） 将转换到关联的之前访问该队列。If you specify a path using the path name syntax (such as `myComputer\myQueue`) rather than using the format name syntax when you read or write to the queue, the primary domain controller (which uses Active Directory) translates the into the associated before accessing the queue. 如果你的应用程序正在脱机工作，则必须使用格式名称语法;否则，该域的主域控制器将不可以执行路径翻译。If your application is working offline, you must use the format name syntax; otherwise, the primary domain controller will not be available to perform the path translation. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的消息队列的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. summary.span: 获取或设置格式化程序，该格式化程序用于将对象序列化为从队列读取或写入队列的消息体，或者用于将从队列读取或写入队列的消息体反序列化为对象。

value.span: 该 产生要写入消息体或要从消息体中读取的流。

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个格式化程序对象，该转换时你的应用程序读取或写入到队列的消息对象的实例。The property contains an instance of a formatter object, which transforms messages when your application reads or writes to the queue. 当应用程序将消息发送到队列时，格式化程序对象序列化为流，并将它插入到消息正文。When the application sends message to the queue, the formatter serializes the object into a stream and inserts it into the message body. 当从队列中读取，格式化程序反序列化到消息数据属性。When reading from a queue, the formatter deserializes the message data into the property of a . 松散耦合的因此不需要时使用此格式键入发送方和接收方将相同对象。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 和数据序列化为二进制表示形式。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. 和提供更快吞吐量要高于。 and provide faster throughput than the . 允许与 Visual Basic 6.0 消息队列应用程序的互操作性。The allows interoperability with Visual Basic 6.0 Message Queuing applications. 当你的应用程序将消息发送到队列，仅适用于使用默认消息属性，这些消息。When your application sends messages to the queue, the applies only to those messages that use the default message properties, . 如果你发送到队列，消息队列使用格式化程序中定义要改为序列化正文的属性。If you send a to the queue, Message Queuing uses the formatter defined in the property to serialize the body instead. 类将始终使用接收或查看从队列的消息。The class will always use a to receive or peek a message from the queue. 消息使用反序列化属性。The message is deserialized using the property. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了格式设置消息正文使用。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . [!code-cpp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CPP/message_binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CS/message_binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/VB/message_binaryformatter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了格式设置消息正文使用。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回这些消息的队列中的消息，不是动态链接的静态快照。 returns a static snapshot of the messages in the queue, not dynamic links to those messages. 因此，数组不能用于修改在队列中的消息。Therefore, you cannot use the array to modify the messages in the queue. 如果您需要与队列 （如删除消息的能力） 的实时、 动态交互，调用方法，返回队列中的动态列表的消息。If you want real-time, dynamic interaction with the queue (such as the ability to delete messages), call the method, which returns a dynamic list of the messages in the queue. 因为调用该方法返回的队列中的消息副本时，该数组不会反映新消息到达队列中或从队列中删除的消息。Because returns a copy of the messages in the queue at the time the method was called, the array does not reflect new messages that arrive in the queue or messages that are removed from the queue. 检索不通过筛选出这些属性属性。 retrieves only those properties not filtered out by the property. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以有两个用途，以及其他使用计算机的标识符： 读取计算机日志和设置的安全证书。You can use a computer's identifier for two purposes, among others: to read the computer journal and to set security certificates. 但是，不能调用以远程计算机时脱机工作因为的应用程序必须对目录服务的访问，域控制器上。However, you cannot call for a remote computer when you are working offline because the application must have access to the directory service on the domain controller. 计算机标识符 （或的计算机标识符） 是消息队列时，创建一台计算机添加到企业。The computer identifier (or machine identifier) is a that Message Queuing creates when a computer is added to the enterprise. 消息队列结合使用计算机标识符`Machine`和`Journal`关键字创建具有语法的计算机日记格式名`Machine=;Journal`。Message Queuing combines the computer identifier with the `Machine` and `Journal` keywords to create the machine journal's format name, which has the syntax `Machine=;Journal`. 计算机日记，也称为作为日记队列中，是用于存储的副本的系统队列应用程序生成消息时属性是`true`。The machine journal, which is also known as the journal queue, is a system queue that stores copies of application-generated messages when the property is `true`. 构造队列格式名时，此语法为日志才有效。This syntax for the journal is only valid when constructing the format name for the queue. 路径名称语法不`MachineName` \\ `Journal$`。The path name syntax is `MachineName`\\`Journal$`. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|否No| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|否No| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用 。The following code example calls . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在队列中创建的所有消息的动态列表。 creates a dynamic list of all the messages in a queue. 你可以从队列中删除位于枚举器的当前位置的消息通过调用为，返回。You can remove from the queue the message at the enumerator's current position by calling for the that returns. 因为光标位于与队列中消息的动态列表相关联，则枚举将反映对消息在队列中，进行任何修改，如果消息已超出了当前光标位置。Because the cursor is associated with the dynamic list of messages in the queue, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to the messages in the queue, if the message is beyond the current cursor position. 例如，枚举数可以自动访问放置光标的当前位置，之外优先级较低的消息，但不是在该位置之前插入优先级较高的消息。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a lower-priority message placed beyond the cursor's current position, but not a higher-priority message inserted before that position. 但是，你可以重置枚举，从而移动光标返回到的列表中，通过调用为。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 枚举中消息的顺序反映在队列中，其顺序，因此优先级高的消息将出现在优先级较低之前。The order of the messages in the enumeration reflects their order in the queue, so higher-priority messages will appear before lower-priority ones. 如果您需要在队列，而不是动态连接到它们的消息的静态快照，调用。If you want a static snapshot of the messages in the queue rather than a dynamic connection to them, call . 此方法返回的数组对象，表示该方法调用时的消息。This method returns an array of objects, which represent the messages at the time the method was called. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取队列中消息的动态列表和使用的所有消息进行都计数属性设置为。The following code example gets a dynamic list of messages in a queue and counts all messages with the property set to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载返回位于网络上的所有公用队列的枚举。This overload of returns an enumeration of all the public queues that are on the network. 因为光标位于与动态列表相关联，则枚举反映对删除或添加光标的当前位置之后的队列的队列列表进行任何修改。Because the cursor is associated with a dynamic listing, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to a queue list for queues deleted or added beyond the cursor's current position. 添加或删除队列位于光标的当前位置之前不会反映。Additions or deletion of queues located before the cursor's current position are not reflected. 例如，枚举数可以自动访问追加之外光标位置的队列，但不是一插入该位置之前。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a queue appended beyond the cursor position but not one inserted before that position. 但是，你可以重置枚举，从而移动光标返回到的列表中，通过调用为。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 没有任何已定义的排序的网络中的队列。There is no defined ordering of queues in a network. 一个枚举器不会不通过进行排序，例如，计算机、 标签、 公共或私有状态或任何其他可访问的条件。An enumerator does not order them, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or any other accessible criteria. 如果您需要静态快照的网络，而不是与它们的动态连接上的队列，调用或。If you want a static snapshot of the queues on the network rather than a dynamic connection to them, call or . 这两种方法的每个返回的数组对象，表示该方法调用时的队列。Each of these two methods returns an array of objects, which represent the queues at the time the method was called. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|否No| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|否No| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例循环访问网络中的所有消息队列，并检查每个队列的路径。The following code example iterates through all the message queues in the network, and examines the path for each queue. 最后，它显示网络上的公用队列的数量。Finally, it displays the number of public queues on the network. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CPP/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CS/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/VB/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.vb#1)]

你可以指定条件后，若要包括，例如，队列创建或修改时间、 计算机名、 标签、 类别或这些项的组合。You can specify the criteria to include, for example, queue creation or modification time, computer name, label, category, or any combination of these. 因为光标位于与动态列表相关联，则枚举反映对队列发生游标的当前位置之后进行任何修改。Because the cursor is associated with a dynamic listing, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to a queue that occurs beyond the cursor's current position. 不反映对队列位于光标的当前位置之前的更改。Changes to queues located before the cursor's current position are not reflected. 例如，枚举数可以自动访问追加之外光标位置的队列，但不是一插入该位置之前。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a queue appended beyond the cursor position but not one inserted before that position. 但是，你可以重置枚举，从而移动光标返回到的列表中，通过调用为。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 没有任何已定义的排序的网络中的队列。There is no defined ordering of queues in a network. 一个枚举器不会不通过进行排序，例如，计算机、 标签、 公共或私有状态或任何其他可访问的条件。An enumerator does not order them, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or any other accessible criteria. 如果你希望网络而不是与它们的动态连接上的队列的静态快照，指定用于条件或调用。If you want a static snapshot of the queues on the network rather than a dynamic connection to them, specify criteria for or call . 这两种方法的每个返回的数组对象，表示该方法调用时的队列。Each of these two methods returns an array of objects, which represent the queues at the time the method was called. 调用， ，或提供相同的结果与调用使用的筛选条件， ，和分别。Calling , , or provides the same results as calling with the filtering criteria of , , and , respectively. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|否No| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|否No| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例循环访问消息队列，并显示"MyComputer"的计算机上的每个队列中的最后一天的已创建并存在的路径。The following code example remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持两种类型的消息检索： 同步和异步。 supports two types of message retrieval: synchronous and asynchronous. 同步方法，和，会导致进程线程等待新消息到达队列中指定的时间间隔。The synchronous methods, and , cause the process thread to wait a specified time interval for a new message to arrive in the queue. 如果指定的时间间隔是，进程线程保持被阻止，直到有可用的新消息。If the specified time interval is , the process thread remains blocked until a new message is available. 另一方面，和（异步方法），允许以继续在一个单独的线程，直到消息到达队列中的主应用程序任务。On the other hand, and (the asynchronous methods), allow the main application tasks to continue in a separate thread until a message arrives in the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of the member. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是必不可少的组成部分的队列的友好名称语法。The is an integral component of the friendly name syntax of the queue . 下表显示当你想要确定使用其友好名称的队列路径时应使用具有指定类型的队列的语法。The following table shows the syntax you should use for a queue of a specified type when you want to identify the queue path using its friendly name. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日记队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日记队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 使用"。"本地计算机时指定。Use "." for the local computer when specifying the . 例如，对于此属性，识别仅的计算机名称`Server0`。Only the computer name is recognized for this property, for example, `Server0`. 属性不支持 IP 地址格式。The property does not support the IP address format. 如果你定义方面，应用程序会引发异常，因为域控制器是路径翻译需要脱机工作时。If you define the in terms of the , the application throws an exception when working offline because the domain controller is required for path translation. 因此，你必须使用为脱机工作时的语法。Therefore, you must use the for the syntax when working offline. ， ，和相关属性。The , , and properties are related. 更改属性会导致属性可以更改。Changing the property causes the property to change. 从新生成和。It is built from the new and the . 更改（例如，若要使用的格式名称语法） 将重置和属性来引用新队列。Changing the (for example, to use the format name syntax) resets the and properties to refer to the new queue. 如果属性为空，设置为指定的计算机日记队列。If the property is empty, the is set to the Journal queue of the computer you specify. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供对消息队列的日志存储限制访问。 provides access to the Message Queuing journal storage limit. 它是唯一时才可用是`true`。It is relevant only when is `true`. 将此属性设置修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他的更改会影响实例Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change 如果在日志或死信队列中存储消息，则应该定期清除要删除不再需要的消息的队列。If you store messages in a journal or dead-letter queue, you should periodically clear the queue to remove messages that are no longer needed. 此类队列中的消息计入队列所驻留的计算机的消息配额。Messages in such a queue count toward the message quota for the computer where the queue resides. （管理员设置的计算机配额。）(The administrator sets the computer quota.) 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. summary.span: 获取或设置队列的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the queue.

value.span: 队列的最大大小，以千字节为单位。

span.span: The maximum size, in kilobytes, of the queue.

value.span: “消息队列”默认设置指定：不存在任何限制。

span.span: The Message Queuing default specifies that no limit exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供对消息队列消息的存储限制，这不同于管理员定义的计算机的消息配额的访问。The provides access to the Message Queuing message storage limit, which is separate from the computer's message quota that the administrator defines. 有关消息配额的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the message quota, see . 将此属性设置修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他的更改会影响实例Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change 如果尝试超过最大队列大小或计算机消息配额，消息可能会丢失。If an attempt is made to exceed either the maximum queue size or the computer message quota, messages might be lost. 当达到队列配额时，消息队列通知发送的应用程序，以指示，队列已满，通过返回否定确认消息的管理队列。When the queue quota is reached, Message Queuing notifies the administration queue of the sending application to indicate that the queue is full, by returning a negative acknowledgment message. 消息队列将继续发送否定确认，直到在队列中消息的总大小低于该限制。Message Queuing continues to send negative acknowledgments until the total size of the messages in the queue drops below the limit. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#22)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此筛选器是一套限制的消息属性的布尔值，接收或查看。This filter is a set of Boolean values restricting the message properties that the receives or peeks. 当接收或查看消息从服务器队列中，它仅检索那些为其值是`true`。When the receives or peeks a message from the server queue, it retrieves only those properties for which the value is `true`. 下面显示的初始属性值属性。The following shows initial property values for the property. 这些设置是相当于调用上。These settings are identical to calling on a . |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||1024 个字节1024 bytes| ||255 个字节255 bytes| ||255 个字节255 bytes| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用限制收到的消息属性。The following code example uses the to restrict the message properties received. summary.span: 获取或设置与队列关联的多路广播地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the multicast address associated with the queue.

Docs.value:
包含有效的多路广播地址（格式如下）的 ，或者为 ，这表示队列与多路广播地址不关联。A that contains a valid multicast address (in the form shown below) or , which indicates that the queue is not associated with a multicast address.
``` <address>:<port> ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于将非事务性队列发送消息时可以使用的多播地址与相关联。The property is used to associate a non-transactional queue with a multicast address that can be used when sending messages. 无法将事务性队列与多播地址相关联。You cannot associate a transactional queue with a multicast address. 当发送应用程序将消息发送到多播地址时，则消息队列都会向与该地址关联的每个队列发送消息的副本。When the sending application sends messages to a multicast address, Message Queuing sends a copy of the message to every queue associated with that address. IP 多播地址必须是从 224.0.0.0 到 239.255.255.255，与设置前四个高序位等于 1110年相对应的类 D 范围内。IP multicast addresses must be in the class D range from 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255, which corresponds to setting the first four high-order bits equal to 1110. 但是，只有某些范围的在此范围内的地址是保留的可用于发送多播的消息。However, only certain ranges of addresses in this range are unreserved and available for sending multicast messages. 保留的多播地址的最新列表，请参阅[Internet 分配号机构 (IANA) Internet 多播地址](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=3859)网页。For the latest list of reserved multicast addresses, see the [Internet Assigned Number Authority (IANA) Internet Multicast Addresses](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=3859) Web page. 没有任何限制上的端口号。There are no restrictions on the port number. 如果多个源计算机发送多播的消息，并且你想要从只有一个源计算机接收消息的特定队列，则每台源计算机必须向不同的 IP 地址和端口号组合发送消息。If several source computers are sending multicast messages and you want a specific queue to receive messages from only one source computer, each source computer must send messages to a different combination of IP address and port number. 若要取消关联的多播地址从队列，将设置属性设置为零长度字符串。To dissociate a queue from a multicast address, set the property to a zero-length string. 不将其设置为`null`，因为这将导致。Do not set it to `null`, as this will result in a . 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语法属性取决于队列的类型它点为下表中所示。The syntax for the property depends on the type of queue it points to, as shown in the following table. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日记队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日记队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 使用"。"来表示本地计算机。Use "." to represent the local computer. ， ，和相关属性。The , , and properties are related. 更改属性会导致属性可以更改。Changing the property causes the property to change. 从新生成和。It is built from the new and the . 更改（例如，若要使用的格式名称语法） 将重置和属性来引用新队列。Changing the (for example, to use the format name syntax) resets the and properties to refer to the new queue. 或者，可以使用或来描述队列路径中下, 表中所示。Alternatively, you can use the or to describe the queue path, as shown in the following table. |参考Reference|语法Syntax|示例Example| |---------------|------------|-------------| |格式名称Format name|`FormatName:` [*格式名*]`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]|`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112| |LabelLabel|`Label:` [*标签*]`Label:` [ *label* ]|`Label:` 标签`Label:` TheLabel| 如果你使用的标签语法属性在发送消息时，将引发异常，如果不是唯一的。If you use the label syntax for the property when you send the message, an exception will be thrown if the is not unique. 若要脱机工作，必须在第一个表中使用格式名语法，而不是友好名称语法。To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, rather than the friendly name syntax in the first table. 否则，因为该域的主域控制器 （在其 Active Directory 处于） 不是可用于为格式名称解析的路径，则会引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller (on which Active Directory resides) is not available to resolve the path to the format name. 设置新路径关闭的消息队列，并释放所有句柄。Setting a new path closes the message queue and releases all handles. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| > [!NOTE] > 在工作组模式下只能使用专用队列。In workgroup mode you can only use private queues. 指定路径中使用的专用队列语法`MachineName` \\ `Private$` \\ `QueueName`。You specify the path using the private queue syntax `MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建新对象使用各种路径名称语法类型。The following code example creates new objects using various path name syntax types. 在每个情况下，它将消息发送到其路径定义构造函数中的队列。In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CPP/mqpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CS/mqpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/VB/mqpath.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Messaging.Message Peek ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message Peek() cil managed
Public Function Peek () As Message
public: System::Messaging::Message ^ Peek();

summary.span: 返回但不移除（查看）此 所引用的队列中的第一条消息。

span.span: Returns without removing (peeks) the first message in the queue referenced by this .

summary.span: 方法是同步的，所以在有可用消息前，该方法阻塞当前线程。

span.span: The method is synchronous, so it blocks the current thread until a message becomes available.

returns.span: 该 表示队列中第一条消息。

span.span: The that represents the first message in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要查看队列，或等待，直到在队列中存在一条消息，请使用此重载。Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait until a message exists in the queue. 方法读取，但不会删除从队列第一条消息。The method reads, but does not remove, the first message from the queue. 因此，重复调用返回同一条消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。Therefore, repeated calls to return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 方法，另一方面，同时读取和从队列中移除第一条消息。The method, on the other hand, both reads and removes the first message from the queue. 重复调用，因此，返回不同的消息。Repeated calls to , therefore, return different messages. 消息队列消息优先级和到达时间根据队列中进行排序。Message Queuing orders messages in the queue according to priority and arrival time. 仅当它为较高优先级的较新的消息放置在旧版本之前。A newer message is placed before an older one only if it is of a higher priority. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 由于此重载不指定超时，则应用程序可能会无限期地等待。Because this overload does not specify a time-out, the application might wait indefinitely. 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. 或者，您可以指定对消息到达队列中使用的重载使用超时，指定超时。Alternatively, you can specify a time-out for a message to arrive in the queue by using the overload of that specifies a time-out. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的示例使用队列上的方法。The following examples use the method on a queue. 在第一个示例中，应用程序等待，直到的消息变得在队列中可用。In the first example, the application waits until a message becomes available in the queue. 请注意第一个示例不会访问消息到达;它只是将暂停处理，直到到达的消息。Note that the first example does not access the message that arrives; it merely pauses processing until a message arrives. 如果队列中已存在一条消息，它将立即返回。If a message already exists in the queue, it will return immediately. 在第二个示例中，包含应用程序定义的消息`Order`类是发送到队列，，然后从队列中查看它。In the second example, a message that contains an application-defined `Order` class is sent to the queue, and then peeked from the queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Peek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_noparms/CPP/mqpeek_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Peek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_noparms/CS/mqpeek_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Peek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_noparms/VB/mqpeek_noparms.vb#1)]

The method is not thread safe.

returns.span: 该 表示队列中第一条消息。
