remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要查看队列，或等待一段指定时间，直到在队列中存在一条消息，请使用此重载。Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait a specified period of time until a message exists in the queue. 如果消息在队列中已存在，方法将立即返回。The method returns immediately if a message already exists in the queue. 方法读取，但不会删除从队列第一条消息。The method reads, but does not remove, the first message from the queue. 因此，重复调用返回同一条消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。Therefore, repeated calls to return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 方法，另一方面，同时读取和从队列中移除第一条消息。The method, on the other hand, both reads and removes the first message from the queue. 重复调用，因此，返回不同的消息。Repeated calls to , therefore, return different messages. 消息队列消息优先级和到达时间根据队列中进行排序。Message Queuing orders messages in the queue according to priority and arrival time. 仅当它为较高优先级的较新的消息放置在旧版本之前。A newer message is placed before an older one only if it is of a higher priority. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 线程将被阻塞段指定的时间，或者如果你表明。The thread will be blocked up to the specified period of time, or indefinitely if you indicated . 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法的超时值为零，以检查队列是否为空。The following code example uses the method with a time-out of zero to check whether the queue is empty. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Peek_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_timeout/CPP/mqpeek_timeout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Peek_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_timeout/CS/mqpeek_timeout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Peek_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_timeout/VB/mqpeek_timeout.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法引用的队列中查找的消息其匹配所指定`correlationId`参数。This method looks in the queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果不找到任何消息匹配`correlationID`参数，将引发异常。If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, an exception is thrown. 属性用于将发送到队列相关联的响应、 报表或确认消息发送到的消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 其他两种方法，可以查看队列中的消息。Two other methods allow you to peek messages in a queue. 方法返回第一条消息在队列中，与方法用于检索一条消息，通过指定其唯一标识符。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收包含订单与队列的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 它特别请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法引用的队列中查找的消息其匹配所指定`correlationId`参数。This method looks in the queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果不找到任何消息匹配`correlationID`参数，并且没有新消息到达队列中通过指定的时间内`timeout`参数，将引发异常。If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, and no new message arrives in the queue within the period specified by the `timeout` parameter, an exception is thrown. `timeout`参数未指定的总运行时间为此方法。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定为新消息到达队列中等待的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次有新消息到达时，此方法检查的新消息，以查看其是否符合`correlationId`参数。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `correlationId` parameter. 如果没有，此方法通过启动超时期限，等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息继续到达超时时间内，则可能为此方法继续运行; 如果无限期，直到在超时期限过期并且没有任何新的消息到达，或者直到消息到达其匹配`correlationId`参数。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `correlationId` parameter. 属性用于将发送到队列相关联的响应、 报表或确认消息发送到的消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 其他两种方法，可以查看队列中的消息。Two other methods allow you to peek messages in a queue. 方法返回第一条消息在队列中，与方法用于检索一条消息，通过指定其唯一标识符。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用若要读取，而不必从队列中，删除一条消息，都有一个已知的消息标识符。Use to read, without removing from the queue, a message that has a known message identifier. 一条消息的标识符是消息队列企业中，唯一的因此将最多一条消息匹配的队列中给定`id`参数。The identifier of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 如果队列中当前不包含消息，此重载将引发异常。This overload throws an exception if the queue does not currently contain the message. 两个其他方法使您得以队列中扫视消息：和。Two additional methods allow you to peek messages in a queue: and . 方法返回的第一个消息队列; 中返回确认、 报表或创建第一条消息发送到队列的应用程序生成的响应消息。The method returns the first message in the queue; returns an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . 如果无限期，直到在超时期限过期并且没有任何新的消息到达，或者直到消息到达其匹配`id`参数。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `id` parameter. 两个其他方法使您得以队列中扫视消息：和。Two additional methods allow you to peek messages in a queue: and . 方法返回的第一个消息队列; remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法读取具有已知的查找标识符的消息，而不必从队列中将其删除。Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier without removing it from the queue. 如果消息也不会在队列中，此方法将立即引发异常。This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue. 属性的消息是唯一的队列消息所在的位置，因此将最多一条消息匹配的队列中给定`lookupId`参数。The property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter. 读取具有指定标识符的消息并将其从队列删除，请使用方法。To read a message with a specified identifier and remove it from the queue, use the method. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理中用于引发事件队列中出现一条消息时。 is used in asynchronous processing to raise the event when a message is available in the queue. 用于完成通过调用启动的操作和扫视消息时引发事件。 is used to complete the operation initiated by a call to and peek the message when the event is raised. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建名为一个事件处理程序`MyPeekCompleted`，将其附加到事件处理程序委托，然后调用启动位于路径的队列上的异步查看操作"。 \myQueue"。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 当引发事件，该示例扫视消息，并将其正文写入到屏幕。When a event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen. 该示例然后调用以启动新的异步扫视操作The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CPP/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CS/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/VB/mqbeginpeek_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除队列导致消息队列设置队列修改标志，这会影响属性。Purging the queue causes Message Queuing to set the queue modification flag, which affects the property. 从队列中清除的消息都将丢失;它们不发送到死信队列或日志队列。Messages that are purged from the queue are lost; they are not sent to the dead-letter queue or the journal queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以组合与创建一个友好队列的名称。You can combine the with the to create a friendly name for the queue. 友好名称变体的语法属性取决于队列的类型下表中所示。The syntax for the friendly name variation of the property depends on the type of queue, as shown in the following table. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日记队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| 使用"。"来表示本地计算机。Use "." to represent the local computer. 更改属性将影响属性。Changing the property affects the property. 如果你设置但不包括设置属性，属性变为。\\`QueueName`.If you set the without setting the property, the property becomes .\\`QueueName`. 否则为变得`MachineName` \\ `QueueName`。Otherwise, the becomes `MachineName`\\`QueueName`. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供用于查看和从队列接收消息的消息队列对象的本机 Windows 句柄。The provides a native Windows handle to the message queue object that is used for peeking and receiving messages from the queue. 如果你更改队列的路径，该句柄关闭，并使用新值重新打开。If you change the path of the queue, the handle is closed and reopened with a new value. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载用于接收来自队列的消息或等待，直到在队列中消息。Use this overload to receive a message from a queue, or wait until there are messages in the queue. 方法允许同步读取一条消息，从而它从队列中删除。The method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue. 后续调用将返回后面在队列中，或新，优先级高的消息的消息。Subsequent calls to will return the messages that follow in the queue, or new, higher priority messages. 若要读取队列中的第一个消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 使用调用它是当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 因为此重载方法指定无限期超时，则应用程序可能会无限期地等待。Because this overload of the method specifies an infinite time-out, the application might wait indefinitely. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待消息，请考虑使用异步方法， 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for the message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例从队列接收消息，并输出到屏幕该消息有关的信息。The following code example receives a message from a queue and outputs information about that message to the screen. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CPP/mqreceive_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CS/mqreceive_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/VB/mqreceive_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载用于从使用由定义的内部事务上下文的事务性队列接收消息`transaction`参数或等待队列中没有消息。Use this overload to receive a message from a transactional queue using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter, or wait until there are messages in the queue. 方法允许同步读取一条消息，从而它从队列中删除。The method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue. 后续调用将返回后面的消息队列中。Subsequent calls to will return the messages that follow in the queue. 因为此方法调用事务性队列，接收的消息将返回到队列如果则中止此事务。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 消息永久性不删除从队列直到提交事务。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 若要读取队列中的第一个消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用返回的消息关联事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 因为不会的删除队列中的任何消息，将通过调用回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back by a call to . 使用调用它是当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 因为此重载方法指定无限期超时，则应用程序可能会无限期地等待。Because this overload of the method specifies an infinite time-out, the application might wait indefinitely. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待消息，请考虑使用异步方法， 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for the message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到本地计算机上的事务性队列并向队列发送消息。The following code example connects to a transactional queue on the local computer and sends a message to the queue. 然后，它接收包含订单的消息。It then receives the message that contains an order. 如果遇到非事务性队列，则会引发异常并回滚事务。If it encounters a non-transactional queue, it will throw and exception and rollback the transaction. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Receive_transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_transaction/CPP/mqreceive_transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Receive_transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_transaction/CS/mqreceive_transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Receive_transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_transaction/VB/mqreceive_transaction.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message Receive(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Function Receive (timeout As TimeSpan) As Message
public: System::Messaging::Message ^ Receive(TimeSpan timeout);

param.name: timeout
param.span: 一个 指示有新消息可用于检查之前等待的时间。

span.span: A that indicates the time to wait until a new message is available for inspection.

summary.span: 接收由 引用的队列中的第一条可用消息，并且一直等到队列中有可用消息或超时过期。

span.span: Receives the first message available in the queue referenced by the and waits until either a message is available in the queue, or the time-out expires.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载接收消息并在队列中没有消息时在指定的时间段内返回。Use this overload to receive a message and return in a specified period of time if there are no messages in the queue. 方法允许一条消息，同步读取从队列中删除它。The method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, removing it from the queue. 后续调用将返回后面在队列中，或新，优先级高的消息的消息。Subsequent calls to will return the messages that follow in the queue, or new, higher priority messages. 若要读取队列中的第一个消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 使用调用它是当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 线程将被阻止给定的时间段的时间，或者如果你指定的值为`timeout`参数。The thread will be blocked for the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待一条消息，请考虑使用异步方法， 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for a message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例从队列接收消息，并输出到屏幕该消息有关的信息。The following code example receives a message from a queue and outputs information about that message to the screen. 示例暂停执行时等待消息到达队列中最多为 5 秒。The example pauses execution for up to five seconds while waiting for a message to arrive in the queue. public: System::Messaging::Message ^ Receive(TimeSpan timeout, System::Messaging::MessageQueueTransaction ^ transaction);

param.name: timeout
param.span: 一个 指示有新消息可用于检查之前等待的时间。

span.span: A that indicates the time to wait until a new message is available for inspection.

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对象。

span.span: The object.

summary.span: 接收由 引用的事务性队列中的第一条可用消息，并且一直等到队列中有可用消息或超时过期。

span.span: Receives the first message available in the transactional queue referenced by the and waits until either a message is available in the queue, or the time-out expires.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载用于从使用由定义的内部事务上下文的事务性队列接收消息`transaction`参数，并返回在指定时间段内是否存在任何消息队列中。Use this overload to receive a message from a transactional queue using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter, and return within a specified period of time if there are no messages in the queue. 方法允许同步读取一条消息，从而它从队列中删除。The method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue. 后续调用将返回后面的消息队列中。Subsequent calls to will return the messages that follow in the queue. 因为此方法调用事务性队列，接收的消息将返回到队列如果则中止此事务。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 消息永久性不删除从队列直到提交事务。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 若要读取队列中的第一个消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用返回的消息关联事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 因为不会的删除队列中的任何消息，将通过调用回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back by a call to . 使用调用它是当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 线程将被阻止给定的时间段的时间，或者如果你指定的值为`timeout`参数。The thread will be blocked for the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待一条消息，请考虑使用异步方法， 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for a message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of this method. transaction is aborted. 消息永久性不删除从队列直到提交事务。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 若要读取队列中的邮件，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 没有与通过调用返回的消息关联事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 因为不会的删除队列中的任何消息，不需要通过调用回滚。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there is nothing to roll back by a call to . 使用调用它是当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 线程被阻止给定期间的时间，或者如果你指定的值为`timeout`参数。The thread is blocked for the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待一条消息，请考虑使用异步方法， 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for a message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法引用的非事务性队列中查找的消息其匹配所指定`correlationId`参数。This method looks in the non-transactional queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果不找到任何消息匹配`correlationID`参数，将引发异常。If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, an exception is thrown. 否则为消息是从队列中移除并返回到应用程序。Otherwise, the message is removed from the queue and returned to the application. 属性用于将发送到队列相关联的响应、 报表或确认消息发送到的消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 其他两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回第一条消息在队列中，与方法通过指定其唯一标识符来检索一条消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method retrieves a message by specifying its unique identifier. 若要读取具有指定的相关标识符的消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message with a specified correlation identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收包含订单与队列的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 它特别请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. summary.span: 从非事务性队列中接收与给定的相关标识符匹配的消息，并且一直等到队列中出现具有指定相关标识符的消息或者超时过期。

span.span: Receives the message that matches the given correlation identifier (from a non-transactional queue) and waits until either a message with the specified correlation identifier is available in the queue, or the time-out expires.

returns.span: 其 匹配传入的 参数的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法引用的非事务性队列中查找的消息其匹配所指定`correlationId`参数。This method looks in the non-transactional queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 此方法将立即返回指定的相关标识符的消息如果`correlationId`参数是在队列中。This method returns immediately if the message with the correlation identifier specified by the `correlationId` parameter is in the queue. 否则，该方法将等待给定的时间段内的新消息到达。Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive. 如果超时过期之前，不会到达一条新消息，将引发异常。If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown. `timeout`参数未指定的总运行时间为此方法。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定为新消息到达队列中等待的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次有新消息到达时，此方法检查的新消息，以查看其是否符合`correlationId`参数。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `correlationId` parameter. 如果没有，此方法通过启动超时期限，等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息继续到达超时时间内，则可能为此方法继续运行; 如果无限期，直到在超时期限过期并且没有任何新的消息到达，或者直到消息到达其匹配`correlationId`参数。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `correlationId` parameter. 属性用于将发送到队列相关联的响应、 报表或确认消息发送到的消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 其他两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回第一条消息在队列中，与方法用于检索一条消息，通过指定其唯一标识符。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 若要读取具有指定的相关标识符的消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message with a specified correlation identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `correlationId` parameter. 如果没有，此方法通过启动超时期限，等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息继续到达超时时间内，则可能为此方法继续运行; 如果无限期，直到在超时期限过期并且没有任何新的消息到达，或者直到消息到达其匹配`correlationId`参数。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `correlationId` parameter. 因为此方法调用事务性队列，接收的消息将返回到队列如果则中止此事务。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 消息永久性不删除从队列直到提交事务。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 属性用于将发送到队列相关联的响应、 报表或确认消息发送到的消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 其他两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回第一条消息在队列中，与方法用于检索一条消息，通过指定其唯一标识符。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 若要读取具有指定的相关标识符的消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message with a specified correlation identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用返回的消息关联事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 因为不会的删除队列中的任何消息，将无法回滚事务被中止。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法引用的队列中查找的消息其匹配所指定`correlationId`参数。This method looks in the queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 此方法将立即返回指定的相关标识符的消息如果`correlationId`参数是在队列中，使用定义的事务上下文`transactionType`参数。This method returns immediately if the message with the correlation identifier specified by the `correlationId` parameter is in the queue, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 否则，该方法将等待给定的时间段内的新消息到达。Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive. 如果超时过期之前，不会到达一条新消息，将引发异常。If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown. `timeout`参数未指定的总运行时间为此方法。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定为新消息到达队列中等待的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次有新消息到达时，此方法检查的新消息，以查看其是否符合`correlationId`参数。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `correlationId` parameter. 如果没有，此方法通过启动超时期限，等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息继续到达超时时间内，则可能为此方法继续运行; 如果无限期，直到在超时期限过期并且没有任何新的消息到达，或者直到消息到达其匹配`correlationId`参数。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `correlationId` parameter. 指定`Automatic`为`transactionType`参数，如果已存在外部事务上下文附加到你想要用于接收消息的线程。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 指定`Single`如果你想要接收的消息作为单个内部事务。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 你可以指定`None`如果你想要接收来自外部事务上下文事务性队列的消息。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果调用此方法用于从事务性队列接收消息，接收的消息将返回到队列如果则中止此事务。If this method is called to receive a message from a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 消息永久性不删除从队列直到提交事务。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 属性用于将发送到队列相关联的响应、 报表或确认消息发送到的消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 其他两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回第一条消息在队列中，与方法用于检索一条消息，通过指定其唯一标识符。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 若要读取具有指定的相关标识符的消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message with a specified correlation identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用返回的消息关联事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 因为不会的删除队列中的任何消息，将无法回滚事务被中止。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法读取具有已知标识符的消息和从队列中删除它。Use this method to read a message with a known identifier and remove it from the queue. 如果消息也不会在队列中，此方法将立即引发异常。This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue. 消息的属性是消息队列企业中，唯一的因此将最多一条消息匹配的队列中给定`id`参数。The property of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 其他两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回第一条消息在队列中，与方法用于检索确认、 报表或创建第一条消息发送到队列的应用程序生成的响应消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法读取具有已知标识符的消息和从队列中删除它。Use this method to read a message with a known identifier and remove it from the queue. 此方法将立即返回指定标识符的消息如果`id`参数是在队列中。This method returns immediately if the message with the identifier specified by the `id` parameter is in the queue. 否则，该方法将等待给定的时间段内的新消息到达。Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive. 如果超时过期之前，不会到达一条新消息，将引发异常。If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown. `timeout`参数未指定的总运行时间为此方法。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定为新消息到达队列中等待的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次有新消息到达时，此方法检查的新消息，以查看其是否符合`id`参数。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `id` parameter. 如果没有，此方法通过启动超时期限，等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息继续到达超时时间内，则可能为此方法继续运行; 如果无限期，直到在超时期限过期并且没有任何新的消息到达，或者直到消息到达其匹配`id`参数。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `id` parameter. 消息的属性是消息队列企业中，唯一的因此将最多一条消息匹配的队列中给定`id`参数。The property of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 请使用此重载时可接受的当前线程，可以被阻塞，只要新消息继续到达队列所指定的超时时间内`timeout`参数。Use this overload of when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked as long as new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter. 该线程将被阻止至少给定期间的时间，或者如果你指定的值为`timeout`参数，或如果新消息继续到达队列所指定的超时时间内`timeout`参数。The thread will be blocked for at least the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter, or if new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter. 其他两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回第一条消息在队列中，与方法用于检索确认、 报表或创建第一条消息发送到队列的应用程序生成的响应消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法读取具有已知标识符的消息并从队列中，使用由定义的内部事务上下文中移除`transaction`参数。Use this method to read a message with a known identifier and remove it from the queue, using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 此方法将立即返回指定标识符的消息如果`id`参数是在队列中。This method returns immediately if the message with the identifier specified by the `id` parameter is in the queue. 否则，该方法将等待给定的时间段内的新消息到达。Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive. 如果超时过期之前，不会到达一条新消息，将引发异常。If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown. `timeout`参数未指定的总运行时间为此方法。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定为新消息到达队列中等待的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次有新消息到达时，此方法检查的新消息，以查看其是否符合`id`参数。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `id` parameter. 如果没有，此方法通过启动超时期限，等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息继续到达超时时间内，则可能为此方法继续运行; 如果无限期，直到在超时期限过期并且没有任何新的消息到达，或者直到消息到达其匹配`id`参数。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `id` parameter. 消息的属性是消息队列企业中，唯一的因此将最多一条消息匹配的队列中给定`id`参数。The property of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 请使用此重载时可接受的当前线程，可以被阻塞，只要新消息继续到达队列所指定的超时时间内`timeout`参数。Use this overload of when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked as long as new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter. 该线程将被阻止至少给定期间的时间，或者如果你指定的值为`timeout`参数，或如果新消息继续到达队列所指定的超时期限内`timeout`参数。The thread will be blocked for at least the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter, or if new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the timeout period specified by the `timeout` parameter. 因为此方法调用事务性队列，接收的消息将返回到队列如果则中止此事务。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 消息永久性不删除从队列直到提交事务。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 其他两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回第一条消息在队列中，与方法用于检索确认、 报表或创建第一条消息发送到队列的应用程序生成的响应消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回第一条消息在队列中，因此对方法的后续调用返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用返回的消息关联事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 因为不会的删除队列中的任何消息，将无法回滚事务被中止。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法读取具有已知的查找标识符的消息并从队列中，使用定义的事务上下文中移除`transaction`参数。Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier and remove it from the queue, using a transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 如果消息也不会在队列中，此方法将立即引发异常。This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue. 属性的消息是唯一的队列消息所在的位置，因此将最多一条消息匹配的队列中给定`lookupId`参数。The property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter. 因为此方法调用事务性队列，接收的消息将返回到队列如果则中止此事务。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 消息永久性不删除从队列直到提交事务。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 没有与通过调用返回的消息关联事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 因为不会的删除队列中的任何消息，将无法回滚事务被中止。Because does not remove any messages from the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法读取具有已知的查找标识符的消息并从队列中，使用定义的事务上下文中移除`transactionType`参数。Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier and remove it from the queue, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 如果消息也不会在队列中，此方法将立即引发异常。This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue. 属性的消息是唯一的队列消息所在的位置，因此将最多一条消息匹配的队列中给定`lookupId`参数。The property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息，而不必从队列中删除它，使用方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 没有与通过调用返回的消息关联事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 因为不会的删除队列中的任何消息，将无法回滚事务被中止。Because does not remove any messages from the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. 指定`Automatic`为`transactionType`参数，如果已存在外部事务上下文附加到你想要用于接收消息的线程。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 指定`Single`如果你想要接收的消息作为单个内部事务。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 你可以指定`None`如果你想要接收来自外部事务上下文事务性队列的消息。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果调用此方法用于从事务性队列接收消息，接收的消息将返回到队列如果则中止此事务。If this method is called to receive a message from a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 消息永久性不删除从队列直到提交事务。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler ReceiveCompleted;
.event class System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler ReceiveCompleted
Public Custom Event ReceiveCompleted As ReceiveCompletedEventHandler
public: event System::Messaging::ReceiveCompletedEventHandler ^ ReceiveCompleted;

summary.span: 在从队列移除某条消息后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a message has been removed from the queue.

summary.span: 此事件由异步操作 引发。

span.span: This event is raised by the asynchronous operation, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理中用于引发事件队列中出现一条消息时。 is used in asynchronous processing to raise the event when a message is available in the queue. 用于完成通过调用启动的操作和扫视消息时引发事件。 is used to complete the operation initiated by a call to and peek the message when the event is raised. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建名为一个事件处理程序`MyReceiveCompleted`，将其附加到事件处理程序委托，然后调用启动异步接收操作位于路径的队列上"。 \myQueue"。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyReceiveCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous receive operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 当引发事件，该示例中接收的消息，并将其正文写入到屏幕。When a event is raised, the example receives the message and writes its body to the screen. 该示例然后调用再次以启动一个新异步接收操作。The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous receive operation. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted/CPP/mqreceivecompletedeventhandler.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted/CS/mqreceivecompletedeventhandler.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted/VB/mqreceivecompletedeventhandler.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用，为其默认值返回权限列表。When you call , you return the permission list to its default values. 通常，这授予队列创建者的所有权限，并给予每个人对组的以下权限：Generally, this grants the queue creator all permissions, and gives the group Everyone the following rights: - 获取队列的属性。Get the properties of the queue. - 获取队列的权限。Get queue permissions. - 写入队列。Write to the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . param.span: 要发送到队列的对象。

span.span: The object to send to the queue.

summary.span: 将对象发送到此 引用的非事务性队列。

span.span: Sends an object to non-transactional queue referenced by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载将发送一条消息，包含`obj`参数所引用的队列。Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the queue referenced by the . 向队列发送该对象可以为或任何托管的对象。The object you send to the queue can be a or any managed object. 如果不发送任何对象，序列化对象并将其插入到消息的正文。If you send any object other than a , the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message. 如果使用此重载以将消息发送到事务性队列，消息将发送到死信队列中。If you use this overload to send a message to a transactional queue, the message will be sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果你想要是包含其他消息的事务的一部分的消息，请使用采用重载或作为参数。If you want the message to be part of a transaction that contains other messages, use an overload that takes a or as a parameter. 如果你未设置属性之前调用，格式化程序将默认为。If you do not set the property before calling , the formatter defaults to the . 属性而不应用于任何对象。The property applies to any object other than a . 如果指定，例如，标签或优先级使用成员，这些值将应用于包含的类型不是对象的任何消息时你的应用程序将其发送到队列。If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type when your application sends it to the queue. 发送时，属性值设置为优先于和消息的属性优先于队列的属性。When sending a , the property values set for the take precedence over and the message's property takes precedence over the queue's property. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到消息队列，并向队列发送消息。The following code example connects to a message queue and sends a message to the queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Send_obj#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Send_obj/CPP/mqsend_generic.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Send_obj#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Send_obj/CS/mqsend_generic.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Send_obj#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Send_obj/VB/mqsend_generic.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例将发送应用程序定义`Order`类到队列，然后从该队列接收消息。The following code example sends an application-defined `Order` class to a queue and then receives a message from that queue.

span.span: Sends an object to the transactional queue referenced by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载将发送一条消息，包含`obj`为事务性队列的引用参数，使用所定义的内部事务上下文`transaction`参数。Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the transactional queue referenced by the , using an internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 向队列发送该对象可以为或任何托管的对象。The object you send to the queue can be a or any managed object. 如果不发送任何对象，序列化对象并将其插入到消息的正文。If you send any object other than a , the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message. 如果使用此重载以将消息发送到非事务性队列，则消息可能会发送到死信队列中而不引发异常。If you use this overload to send a message to a non-transactional queue, the message might be sent to the dead-letter queue without throwing an exception. 如果你未设置属性之前调用，格式化程序将默认为。If you do not set the property before calling , the formatter defaults to the . 属性而不应用于任何对象。The property applies to any object other than a . 如果指定，例如，标签或优先级使用成员，这些值将应用于包含的类型不是对象的任何消息时你的应用程序将其发送到队列。If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type when your application sends it to the queue. 发送时，属性值设置为优先于和消息的属性优先于队列的属性。When sending a , the property values set for the take precedence over and the message's property takes precedence over the queue's property. 线程处理单元感知，因此，如果你的单元状态`STA`，不能在多个线程中使用的事务。 is threading apartment aware, so if your apartment state is `STA`, you cannot use the transaction in multiple threads. Visual Basic 将设置到的主线程的状态`STA`，因此您必须首先应用中`Main`子例程。Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the in the `Main` subroutine. 否则，利用另一个线程发送事务性消息将引发 异常。Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a exception. 你将应用通过使用下面的片段。You apply the by using the following fragment. ```vb public sub Main() ``` 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将字符串发送到事务性队列，，然后从该队列接收消息。The following code example sends a string to a transactional queue and then receives a message from that queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Send_ObjectTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Send_ObjectTransaction/CPP/mqsend_objtransaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Send_ObjectTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Send_ObjectTransaction/CS/mqsend_objtransaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Send_ObjectTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Send_ObjectTransaction/VB/mqsend_objtransaction.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载将发送一条消息，包含`obj`参数所引用的队列，使用定义的事务上下文`transactionType`参数。Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the queue referenced by the , using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 指定`Automatic`为`transactionType`参数，如果已存在外部事务上下文附加到你想要用于发送消息的线程。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to send the message. 指定`Single`如果你想要将消息发送作为单个内部事务。Specify `Single` if you want to send the message as a single internal transaction. 你可以指定`None`如果你想要将事务性消息发送到非事务性的线程。You can specify `None` if you want to send a transactional message to a non-transactional thread. 向队列发送该对象可以为或任何托管的对象。The object you send to the queue can be a or any managed object. 如果不发送任何对象，序列化对象并将其插入到消息的正文。If you send any object other than a , the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message. 如果你未设置属性之前调用，格式化程序将默认为。If you do not set the property before calling , the formatter defaults to the . 属性而不应用于任何对象。The property applies to any object other than a . 如果指定，例如，标签或优先级使用成员，这些值将应用于包含的类型不是对象的任何消息时你的应用程序将其发送到队列。If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type when your application sends it to the queue. 发送时，属性值设置为优先于和消息的属性优先于队列的属性。When sending a , the property values set for the take precedence over and the message's property takes precedence over the queue's property. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载将发送一条消息，包含`obj`参数所引用的队列。Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the queue referenced by the . 使用此重载，你可以指定用于标识消息的字符串为标签。With this overload, you can specify the string label that identifies the message. 向队列发送该对象可以为，结构、 数据对象或任何托管的对象。The object you send to the queue can be a , a structure, a data object, or any managed object. 如果不发送任何对象，序列化对象并将其插入到消息的正文。If you send any object other than a , the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message. 消息标签是不同于消息队列标签，但又彼此是与应用程序相关的和没有继承到消息队列的含义。The message label is distinct from the message queue label, but both are application-dependent and have no inherit meaning to Message Queuing. 如果使用此重载以将消息发送到事务性队列，消息将发送到死信队列中。If you use this overload to send a message to a transactional queue, the message will be sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果你想要是包含其他消息的事务的一部分的消息，请使用采用重载或作为参数。If you want the message to be part of a transaction that contains other messages, use an overload that takes a or as a parameter. 此属性发送消息之前，必须指定实例。The property for this instance must be specified before you send the message. 如果你未设置属性之前调用，格式化程序将默认为。If you do not set the property before calling , the formatter defaults to the . 属性而不应用于任何对象。The property applies to any object other than a . 如果指定，例如，标签或优先级使用成员，这些值将应用于包含的类型不是对象的任何消息时你的应用程序将其发送到队列。If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type when your application sends it to the queue. 发送时，属性值设置为优先于和消息的属性优先于队列的属性。When sending a , the property values set for the take precedence over and the message's property takes precedence over the queue's property. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . MemberSignature.Value: public void SetPermissions (System.Messaging.AccessControlList dacl);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetPermissions(class System.Messaging.AccessControlList dacl) cil managed
Public Sub SetPermissions (dacl As AccessControlList)
public: void SetPermissions(System::Messaging::AccessControlList ^ dacl);

param.name: dacl
param.span: ，包含一个或多个指定受信者和要授予的权限的访问控制项。

span.span: A that contains one or more access control entries that specify the trustees and the permissions to grant.

summary.span: 基于访问控制列表的内容将访问权限分配给队列。

span.span: Assigns access rights to the queue based on the contents of an access control list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载以授予、 拒绝或撤消权限，通过使用访问控制项的集合来指定受信者和权限的信息。Use this overload to grant, deny, or revoke rights by using a collection of access control entries to specify trustee and permissions information. 这用于，例如，同时向多个用户授予权限。This is used, for example, to grant permissions to multiple users at the same time. 构造时指定的受信者`ace`参数可以为单个用户、 一组用户或计算机。The trustee you specify when you construct the `ace` parameter can be an individual user, a group of users, or a computer. 如果受信者个人，请使用格式`DOMAIN` \\ `user`。If the trustee is an individual, use the format `DOMAIN`\\`user`. 你可以指定"。"受信者以指示本地计算机。You can specify "." for the trustee to indicate the local computer. 通过分配的权限将权限添加到现有列表。The permissions you assign through add rights to the existing list. 默认情况下，公用或专用队列的创建者具有完全控制和域组的每个人都获取队列属性，获取权限，并向队列中写入的权限。By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue. 当调用，用户和权限的信息都会追加到现有列表的底部。When you call , the user and permissions information is appended to the bottom of the existing list. 系统将检查每个顺序，直到发生以下事件之一：The system examines each in sequence until one of the following events occurs: - 访问拒绝显式拒绝任何对一个线程的访问令牌中列出的受信者的请求的访问权限。An access-denied explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token. - 一个或多个访问允许项的线程的访问令牌中显式列出的受信者授予所有请求的访问权限。One or more access-allowed items for trustees listed in the thread's access token explicitly grant all the requested access rights. - 所有已检查项，并且没有仍在至少一个请求的访问权限，没有已明确允许，在这种情况下，访问被隐式拒绝。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied. 构造时`dacl`参数，你将添加实例到你集合。When you construct the `dacl` parameter, you add instances to your collection. 在构造每个访问控制项时，你可以指定泛型或标准访问权限。When you construct each access control entry, you can specify generic or standard access rights. 对队列的权限可以是以下任意组合：The rights to a queue can be any combination of the following: - 删除Delete - 读取安全设置Read Security - 编写安全Write Security - 同步Synchronize - 修改所有者Modify Owner - 读取Read - WriteWrite - 执行Execute - 必需Required - 全部All - 无None 这些权限是一组可使用或按位运算符进行组合的位标志。These rights are a set of bit flags that you can combine using the OR bitwise operator. - 完全控制Full Control - 删除消息Delete Message - 接收消息Receive Message - 扫视消息Peek Message - 接收日志消息Receive Journal Message - 获取队列属性Get Queue Properties - 设置队列属性Set Queue Properties - 获取权限Get Permissions - 设置权限Set Permissions - 获取队列所属权Take Queue Ownership - 写入消息Write Message 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载以授予、 拒绝或撤消权限，通过使用访问控制项指定受信者和权限信息。Use this overload to grant, deny, or revoke rights by using an access control entry to specify trustee and rights information. 构造时指定的受信者`ace`参数可以为单个用户、 一组用户或计算机。The trustee you specify when you construct the `ace` parameter can be an individual user, a group of users, or a computer. 如果受信者个人，请使用格式`DOMAIN` \\ `user`。If the trustee is an individual, use the format `DOMAIN`\\`user`. 你可以指定"。"受信者以指示本地计算机。You can specify "." for the trustee to indicate the local computer. 通过分配的权限将权限添加到现有列表。The permissions you assign through add rights to the existing list. 默认情况下，公用或专用队列的创建者具有完全控制和域组的每个人都获取队列属性，获取权限，并向队列中写入的权限。By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue. 当调用，用户和权限的信息都会追加到现有列表的底部。When you call , the user and permissions information is appended to the bottom of the existing list. 系统将检查每个顺序，直到发生以下事件之一：The system examines each in sequence until one of the following events occurs: - 访问拒绝显式拒绝任何对一个线程的访问令牌中列出的受信者的请求的访问权限。An access-denied explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token. - 一个或多个访问允许项的线程的访问令牌中显式列出的受信者授予所有请求的访问权限。One or more access-allowed items for trustees listed in the thread's access token explicitly grant all the requested access rights. - 所有已检查项，并且没有仍在至少一个请求的访问权限，没有已明确允许，在这种情况下，访问被隐式拒绝。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied. 对在指定的队列的权限`rights`参数在构造时你，可以是以下任意组合：The rights to a queue, which you specify in the `rights` parameter when you construct your , can be any combination of the following: - 完全控制Full Control - 删除消息Delete Message - 接收消息Receive Message - 扫视消息Peek Message - 接收日志消息Receive Journal Message - 获取队列属性Get Queue Properties - 设置队列属性Set Queue Properties - 获取权限Get Permissions - 设置权限Set Permissions - 获取队列所属权Take Queue Ownership - 写入消息Write Message `rights`参数的构造函数中指定`ace`参数是一个标志的枚举。The `rights` parameter you specify in the constructor for the `ace` parameter is a flag of the enumeration. 它表示一组位标志，你可以组合使用按位运算符或生成时`rights`参数。It represents a set of bit flags that you can combine using the bitwise operator OR when you build the `rights` parameter. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . 所有已检查项，并且没有仍在至少一个请求的访问权限，没有已明确允许，在这种情况下，访问被隐式拒绝。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied. 对队列中指定的权限`rights`参数，可以是以下任意组合：The rights to a queue, specified in the `rights` parameter, can be any combination of the following: - 所有已检查项，并且没有仍在至少一个请求的访问权限，没有已明确允许，在这种情况下，访问被隐式拒绝。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied. 对队列中指定的权限`rights`参数，可以是以下任意组合：The rights to a queue, specified in the `rights` parameter, can be any combination of the following: - 完全控制Full Control - 删除消息Delete Message - 接收消息Receive Message - 扫视消息Peek Message - 接收日志消息Receive Journal Message - 获取队列属性Get Queue Properties - 设置队列属性Set Queue Properties - 获取权限Get Permissions - 设置权限Set Permissions - remarks.format: ## Remarks A或事件源于或请求，分别为特定线程。A or event results from a or request, respectively, to a specific thread. 通常情况下，时设置其相关的组件放在控件或窗体，因为这些组件绑定到特定线程。Typically, the is set when its related component is placed inside a control or a form, because those components are bound to a specific thread. 通常情况下，同步的对象封送到单个线程的方法调用。Typically, the synchronizing object marshals a method call into a single thread.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示队列是否只接受事务。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the queue accepts only transactions.

value.span: 如果队列只接受作为事务的一部分发送的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the queue accepts only messages sent as part of a transaction; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务性消息处理是指成单个事务的多个相关邮件耦合。Transactional messaging refers to the coupling of several related messages into a single transaction. 发送消息，因为事务的一部分可确保消息都会传递顺序情况下，只传递一次，以及从其目标队列中成功检索。Sending messages as part of a transaction ensures that the messages are delivered in order, delivered only once, and successfully retrieved from their destination queue. 如果队列是事务性的它接受作为事务一部分发送的消息。If a queue is transactional, it accepts only messages that are sent as part of a transaction. 但是，非事务性消息将要发送或接收从本地事务队列，而无需使用显式事务， ，和语法。However, a non-transactional message can be sent or received from a local transaction queue without explicitly using transactional , , and syntax. 如果非事务性消息发送到事务性队列，此组件创建一个单个消息事务，除非在引用使用直接格式名的远程计算机上的队列的情况下。If a non-transactional message is sent to a transactional queue, this component creates a single-message transaction for it, except in the case of referencing a queue on a remote computer using a direct format name. 在此情况下，如果发送消息时未指定事务上下文，其中一个不会为你创建，并且消息将发送到死信队列。In this situation, if you do not specify a transaction context when sending a message, one is not created for you and the message will be sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果将非事务性消息发送到事务性队列中时，你将不能回滚发生异常时消息。If you send a non-transactional message to a transactional queue, you will not be able to roll back the message in the event of an exception. 线程处理单元感知，因此，如果你的单元状态`STA`，不能在多个线程中使用的事务。 is threading apartment aware, so if your apartment state is `STA`, you cannot use the transaction in multiple threads. Visual Basic 将设置到的主线程的状态`STA`，因此您必须首先应用中`Main`子例程。Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the in the `Main` subroutine. 否则，利用另一个线程发送事务性消息将引发 异常。Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a exception. 你将应用通过使用下面的片段。You apply the by using the following fragment. ```vb public sub Main() ``` 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的消息队列的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#27)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当消息队列应用程序创建一个新的应用程序队列时，它将自动在同一位置创建关联的日记队列。When the Message Queuing application creates a new application queue, it automatically creates an associated journal queue in the same location. 日记队列用于跟踪从队列中移除的消息。The journal queue is used to track the messages removed from a queue. 将此属性设置修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他的更改会影响实例。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 日记队列不跟踪消息从队列删除，因为其接收时间计时器已过期，也不会跟踪消息从队列中清除通过使用消息队列目录服务 （信息存储或 Active Directory）。The journal queue does not track messages removed from the queue because their time-to-be-received timer expired, nor does it track messages purged from the queue by using a Message Queuing directory service (Information Store or Active Directory). 应用程序不能将消息发送到日志队列;它们仅限于只读访问权限的这些队列。Applications cannot send messages to journal queues; they are limited to read-only access of these queues. 此外，消息队列永远不会消息从队列中删除日志。Furthermore, Message Queuing never removes messages from journal queues. 通过接收它们或清除队列，使用队列的应用程序必须清除这些消息。The application using the queue must clear these messages either by receiving them or by purging the queue. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息队列的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#28)]

span.span: A handle to the native queue object that you use for sending messages to the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供用于将消息发送到队列的消息队列对象的本机 Windows 句柄。The provides a native Windows handle to the message queue object that is used for sending messages to the queue. 如果你更改队列的路径，该句柄关闭，并使用新值重新打开。If you change the path of the queue, the handle is closed and reopened with a new value. 下表显示此属性是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|否No| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|
